summary: Skyrim is a land of vast adventure and violence and should be treated as such...This ENB is basically for those who want to make the world of Skyrim look and feel incredibly realistic and dark at the same time. I guarantee only the best lighting, DOF, and feel there is to offer.
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim is a land of vast adventure and violence and should be treated as such...This ENB is basically for those who want to make the world of Skyrim look and feel more realistic and dark at the same time. I guarantee only the best lighting, DOF, and feel there is to offer. Or in other words, it\'s for those with that unmistakable Bleak Persona.

[IMG]http://i1174.photobucket.com/albums/r614/Kai_Soi/BLEAKENNB.png[/IMG]

________________________________________________________________________________________
[size=30][color=red] Bleak Persona ENB v1.2[/color] [/size]


[size=7][color=green]This ENB includes as follows:[/color] [/size]

- Detailed Shadows

- Photo-realistic Faces and Features

- Greater Contrast Between Day and Night

- Darker palette

- Heavily Tweaked Smooth or  Bokeh DOF

- Low Bloom

- Sun Rays

- HDR

- Medium Desaturation

- SSAO (Disable if you have perfomance issues)

- Darker Nights, Dungeons and Caves

- Customizable Film Grain (Not included in screenshots as of yet)


[IMG]http://i1174.photobucket.com/albums/r614/Kai_Soi/2012-06-08_00062.jpg[/IMG]
_________________________________________________________________________________________

[size=17]Recommended Mods:[/size]

- 2k Textures (used in screenshots)

- WATER (Allows your character to actually get wet, High res water textures)

- New camera, New experience (shouldered 3rd person view)

I\'m going to implement this version of ENB to the new version of ENB (0.13) and am going to keep tweaking and updating the ENB until I finally say: \" Real life graphics suck, back to Skyrim\". 

[IMG]http://i1174.photobucket.com/albums/r614/Kai_Soi/2012-06-09_00010.jpg[/IMG]
_________________________________________________________________________________________

[size=17]Credits: [/size]

- Boris  Vorontsov 

- HD6 

- Matso

[youtube]s-vkv-T6OAE&feature=g-all-u[/youtube]

_________________________________________________________________________________________

[size=14]Make sure you get the d3d9 dll from www.enbdev.com before playing[/size]

[IMG]http://i1174.photobucket.com/albums/r614/Kai_Soi/2012-06-14_00038.jpg[/IMG]
_________________________________________________________________________________________


[size=20]If you have any problems or suggestions, feel free to type them in the comments! 

If you like Bleak Persona ENB then please [color=green]Endorse![/color] [/size]

[IMG]http://i1174.photobucket.com/albums/r614/Kai_Soi/2012-06-10_00025.jpg[/IMG]
author: Andrewtak
